summary: Attempts to finish off what Caliente started with her vanilla outfits for bodyslide
descriptionHtml:
With the release of Bodyslide 2 and Outfit studio, converting outfits to Bodyslide has become much easier. I've taken it upon myself to try and convert the rest of Skyrim's outfits to Bodyslide.

There will be issues with some outfits; some not having been converted, clipping, texture madness and the like. It's your duty, as a downloader, to report to me any and all issues that are to do with this mod.

If you have mods (such as HDT physics) and are having issues, disable those first and see if it persists.

This is best used with Caliente's original mod, as I'm not going to reinvent the wheel unless her outfits have issues which I can remedy. Get it here. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?


Known issues:

Mage robes have messed up lighting - *UPDATE* I may have figured out the problem. It involves removing parts of the mesh and enabling a flag in Nifskope. When I get over the slight burnout of converting the 59 or so outfits, I'll fix it.

Dragonscale has black textures on arms - Don't know how to solve this issue.

Savior's Hide doesn't morph. Will fix.

The female ragged trouser continuity version doesn't work. Will fix.
author: FiftyTifty
